claim_card.claim: A stationary condition is asserted: when dΦ/dt = 0, the system approaches a stable Φ* value, proposed as a cross-scale boundary condition.
claim_card.test_hook: Across different initial conditions and resolutions, test whether stable runs converge to the same (or tightly clustered) Φ*.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: When stable, dΦ/dt = 0 yields Φ = Φ*.
